data.title: Incredible Place
data.text:
We travel around every year and go to different haunted attractions and I must say this is one of my favorites! 

We drove 3 + hours and it was worth it don't pass this place up! 

Be sure to buy your tickets online though or you will be waiting a long time! 

The actors are phenomenal and love what they do, and it shows and makes a difference. 

The different levels in this haunt and the feel of invertigo was awesome! 

The props were very cool and the scenes they have are out of this world! 

Parts of it is very dark and uneven so be prepared and careful! 

Thanks for a great time can't wait to come back! 

Keep up the great work

data.title: Best haunted house
data.text: This was the best haunted house I've ever been to. Everyone stayed in character and the sensory experience was incredible! Highly recommend!

data.title: Erebus Haunted House
data.text: Great haunted house! My advice would be to buy the VIP ticket. The line is very long and it's well worth the exta money.

data.title: Great!
data.text: Waited years to go and the hype made it worth it. Purchase tickets in advance to avoid waiting!!! Only waited 30 minutes. Actors love what they do and it shows! The darkness keeps you on your toes and the different levels are amazing! Spooks around every corner, unexpected! Unique, one of the best I've ever been to.

data.title: Awesome and scary
data.text: great place to go to with a group of friends...got scared multiple times...long lines and pricey though but worth it...took some time to find and travel time is a bit long.

data.title: Not scary at all
data.text: I was expecting this to blow my mind with fear but nope, I laughed all the way through and had to be very vigilante of where I was stepping in order to not trip. I am sorry but this attraction is way overrated. I'd say it's a kiddie haunted house. Apparently it is very successful but I have been to much scarier.

data.title: If you get the chance to go do not pass it up!
data.text: This is one of the best and we should know we travel every year to different states every Halloween to visit different Haunted attractions. This will be one of the ones that you use to judge all of the rest by. They keep good spacing between groups we did not even see another group until the middle where they once again que you up and separate your group from others. The props were good and did the gambit of different types of scenes. They had a lot of in house built props as well. The actors love what they do and the let you know it. They also keep you looked after even while you are waiting in line!
